title: Tolgshow
overview: Tolga Çevik's highly anticipated new program Tolgshow is ready to broadcast! Tolga Çevik, who has made millions laugh for 10 years with his improvised 'My Friend' character, will host surprise guests in his new program. Tolgshow, which also features 'Mysterious Director' Fırat Parlak and 'Little Musician' Özer Atik, will again pass between misunderstandings, obscurities, bickering and laughter. Tolgshow, produced by 25 Film, will be on FOX with its first episode on Saturday, December 30th at 23.30.
